name: Dr. Cathy J. Gomez
description: Expert in dog health and wellness, Dr. Cathy ensures every pup gets the best treatment with love and care.

name: Dr. Velma S. Barry
description: Dr. Velma specializes in feline nutrition and grooming, helping cats stay active and healthy all year round.

name: Dr. Carol C. Queen
description: Dr. Carol is skilled in caring for rabbits, birds, and other exotic pets with gentle hands and expert advice.

name: Dr. Julie K. Rusella
description: Dr. Julie focuses on pet vaccination and preventive care to keep your furry friends safe and protected.
